name: Stars National Walker

about.title: About Our Team
about.description: Stars National Walker is an elite 16U travel softball team based in Charlotte, NC with players from around the country. We compete in top-tier national tournaments and are dedicated to player development and college placement.

features.title: Elite Competition
features.description: We compete in PGF, Alliance, and other top-tier national tournaments.

features.title: College Placement
features.description: Dedicated recruiting support to help players find their perfect college fit.

features.title: Player Development
features.description: Focused on developing well-rounded athletes both on and off the field.

coaches.name: Joe Walker
coaches.title: Head Coach
coaches.bio: Coach Joe Walker founded the Stars National Walker program with a vision of developing elite softball players who excel both on the field and in the classroom. With a background in competitive softball and a deep understanding of the recruiting landscape, he prepares athletes for success at the next level through rigorous training and mental preparation.

coaches.name: Adrian Diaz
coaches.title: Assistant Coach
coaches.bio: Coach Adrian specializes in pitching and catching development, bringing technical expertise and a player-first mentality to every practice. His ability to break down mechanics and communicate adjustments helps players make rapid improvements in their game.

coaches.name: Jeremiah Perez
coaches.title: Assistant Coach
coaches.bio: Coach Jeremiah focuses on hitting and infield development, with a keen eye for mechanical adjustments that unlock power and consistency at the plate. His positive coaching style and attention to detail help players build confidence and reach their full potential.

recruitingCoordinator.name: Mike Usry
recruitingCoordinator.title: Recruiting Coordinator
recruitingCoordinator.bio: Mike guides each player through the college recruiting process, from building prospect profiles to connecting with college coaches. He maintains relationships with programs across all divisions and helps families understand the timeline, expectations, and opportunities available at the collegiate level.

description: Stars National Walker is an elite 16U travel softball team based in Charlotte, NC with players from around the country. We compete in top-tier national tournaments and are dedicated to player development and college placement.
